control.description: Manually enter artist and album name to lookup the artist and album information on the internet
Start party mode (randomly play musicvideos from your collection)
Flatten library (hide sub-catagories, like genres, studios, years, etc...)
Filter the media files to only show items that include the specified string in the name
Search for a string anywhere in the XBMC video database
Show only watched, unwatched or all videos
Stack button (used to display multi-part videos as a single item)
